pages.text: The $(mob)Slime Girl$() is a helper that can be spawned from the $(thing)Slime Girl Egg$(). It flees when attacked, but can trade various items in exchange for $(item)Slimeballs$(), similar to a $(l:minecraft_villager)$(mob)Villager$().
$(mob)Slime Girls$() can drop a $(item)Slime Girl Egg$() on death. This item can be used to spawn a passive $(mob)Slime Girl$() helper for the player.
